name: Dice-Party
description:
Dice   Party -  a small Dice Party Game!

In Dice Party you can't choose what you play the dice chooses for you! Have a great Time playing 6 diffrent mini-games while hearing the amazing backgroung music from Panda Beats!

This game was made during  the GMTK Gamejam 2022!

Credits:

Music: https://pandabeatsmusic.com/downloads/
Color Theme: https://lospec.com/palette-list/verso-64

Fonts: Lexend + Deca https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Lexend+Deca

Fredoka https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fredoka+One#standard-styles
